Interface UsersService

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface UsersService

Module registry service.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez.

Method Detail

getUsers

List<UserSelDTO> getUsers()
                          throws PMSException
Returns all registered users.

Returns:
All registered users.
Throws:
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
PMSException

get

UserDTO get(String id)
            throws PMSException
Gets the detail of a user.

Parameters:
id - ID of the user.
Returns:
The requested detail.
Throws:
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
PMSException

save

UserDTO save(UserDTO dto)
             throws PMSException
Saves an user content type. If the ID is null the operation is considered an insertion. Otherwise, it is considered an update.

Parameters:
dto - User to save.
Returns:
The saved user.
Throws:
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
DuplicateUserException - if there is another user with the same name.
UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
PMSException

getPortalAuthorities

Set<PortalAuthority> getPortalAuthorities(String id,
                                          String portalId)
                                          throws PMSException
Returns the portal-level authorities granted to a user.

Parameters:
id - User Id.
portalId - Portal Id.
Returns:
The set of granted authorities.
Throws:
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
PortalNotFoundException - if the portal is not found.
PMSException

                          String portalId,
                          Set<PortalAuthority> granted)
                          throws PMSException
Sets the portal-level authorities granted to a user.

Parameters:
id - User Id.
portalId - Portal Id.
granted - The set of granted authorities.
Throws:
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

setPassword

void setPassword(String id,
                 String password)
                 throws PMSException
Sets an user's password.

Parameters:
id - User Id.
password - User password.
Throws:
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
InvalidOperationException - if no password changes are allowed.
